input.oldString:
{['Diabetes', 'Autoimmune disease', 'EDS', 'MCAS'].map((condition) => (
{ if (checked) { setComorbidities(prev => [...prev, condition]) } else { setComorbidities(prev => prev.filter(c => c !== condition)) } }} />
))}
input.newString:

{ if (checked) { setComorbidities(prev => [...prev, condition]) } else { setComorbidities(prev => prev.filter(c => c !== condition)) } }} />
))}
